simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This command takes one or two arguments: prefix and URI, both evaluated as names. It creates a namespace declaration of the form xmlns:prefix="URI" on the current node. The command produces an error if the prefix is already declared in the scope of the current node with a different namespace URI.

simplesect.title: Sections
simplesect.para: Namespaces in XML and XPath, Tree modification
